publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-525.1# Patrick Harvie: Glasgow Crossrail Scheme-As an amendment to motion (S2M-525) in the name of Bill Butler, insert at end "and further believes that the crossrail scheme represents a logical alternative to the M74 Northern Extension."

S2M-525.1# Patrick Harvie: Glasgow Crossrail Scheme-As an amendment to motion (S2M-525) in the name of Bill Butler, insert at end "and further believes that the crossrail scheme represents a logical alternative to the M74 Northern Extension."
